name: NLB
description:
NLB Group is the leading banking and financial group with headquarters and an exclusive strategic interest in our home region â€“ Southeast Europe. In addition to NLB d.d., a main entity in Slovenia and a public company, NLB Group is comprised of six subsidiary banks and several companies for ancillary services. The Group utilises a universal banking model and supports its clients through retail, corporate, and investment banking services. On six out of seven markets where the Group operates, the market share of member banks exceeds 10% (measured by total assets).
